oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Sour Apple Tree, or Jeff Davis' Last Ditch
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a folio-sized song, original Civil War period ballad by J. W. Turner about Jefferson Davis. The cover features a cartoon depicting Davis wearing a dress.
Jefferson Davis was captured on May 10, 1865, at Irwinville in Irwin County, Georgia. After being captured, he was held as a prisoner for two years in Fort Monroe, Virginia.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Turner, J. W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889
Sheet music covers; Music title pages; Music publishing industry; Songs; Ballads
